cause.description:
Mcdonalds, Wendys, Burger King etc... Say good-bye to small, medium and large size items, the only thing that will be allowed to be sold is Supersized fatty ass items. We're talking 1000+ fatty calories only.
1. People need to be fatter
2. Heart attacks at a young age are awesome
cause.mission: Influence Obesity and Cause Heart Attacks
cause.name: Supersize me Bitch
